The prosecution invited the officers crucial to the investigation to expound on their findings. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and role in the investigation. On the night of January 1st, Officer C. D. Davis discovered an unsettling scene in the alley and reported it. The investigation ensued right away. PROSECUTOR: Who orchestrated the forensic examination? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Foster and Technician G. H. Howard led the forensic analysis. PROSECUTOR: Who handled the interrogations? WITNESS: Detectives I. J. Johnson and K. L. King managed the interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense initiated a precise cross-examination of Captain Anderson regarding the investigative techniques. Throughout the trial, Patrol Officer M. N. Nelson, Patrol Officer O. P. Peterson, and Patrol Officer Q. R. Robinson were also summoned to testify.
